author: Karina Barr
content: I used Bouncy Castle Hire Bexley yesterday for my son and daughter's joint birthday party and couldn't recommend them highly enough. Very good service received throughout. Sarah and Spencer were quick at responding to my messages and good at offering advice as this was the first children's party I had planned. Prompt with drop off and collection even though my party was slightly out of their normal area. Thank you Spencer and Sarah ï¿½
